event.title: Talk night #4: Cross-platform mobile tools
event.description:
Our next talk night will be all about the wonderful world of write once, run anywhere.

We will be talking about a few of the cross-platform toolsets that are out there - from Phonegap, the popular HTML 'hybrid' solution, to Corona and Appceletaror, which compile down to native code.

The Stag and Hounds is our host once again, remember they have a Â£10 minimum spend on cards.
